article:
It is Mary's birthday. She gets a _ from her uncle. "Dear Mary," he _ in the letter. "Happy birthday. I _ you some chickens. They will arrive tomorrow. I hope you will like _ . Uncle Toby."
Mary is very happy. She likes _ eggs and chicken. "I can _ the chickens, then I can get many eggs." She thinks. The chickens arrive the next day. They are in a box. Mary is very happy. She takes the box off the truck and begins to carry them _ her garden, but the box is _ big, she can't carry it far.
The box falls down on the _ and breaks . The chickens _ run out. They run here and there. Mary spends hours trying to find them. A week later her uncle comes. He asks Mary, "Do you like the chickens?" "Yes, but I drop the box to the ground. It breaks open and the chickens run everywhere. It takes me three hours to find them."Mary says.
"Do you find them all?" asks her uncle. "I hope _ ,"Mary answers. "I only get eleven of them."
"That's very _ . I only send you six", her uncle says with a smile.
